adirondacks.png.description: a mountain landscape that includes a body of water in the foreground and a cloudy sky with a bright sun shining in the background

arizona-mountains.png.description: a mountain landscape with bushes in the foreground and a blue sky sparsely populated with clouds in the background

bear-lake.png.description: a mountain landscape with a clear blue sky in the background and a body of water with the mountains reflected in the foreground

grassy-mountains.png.description: a mountain landscape with grassy, tree-populated hills in the foreground and a blue sky with cumulus clouds in the background

nz-mountains.png.description: a snowy mountain landscape with a gray, cloudy sky and a small body of water in the foreground, mostly hidden by more mountains

snowy-mountains.png.description: a dramatic mountain landscape with lots of snow; the background is cloudy near the mountains, and there is clear blue sky above the clouds

sunny-grass-mountains.png.description: a mountain landscape with a sun peeking out from behind the mountains, and a grassy foreground

sunrise-mountains.png.description: a mountain landscape with a bright sun in the background, with visible rays shining across the rocky and tree-filled foreground

sunset-mountains.png.description: a mountain landscape with a pink sky in the background that reflects over the large body of water in the foreground
